Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight 6-line stanzas (ababcc) with 2-line refrain, ‘Oure woo þou sease oure joy increse / Graunt us þat pease þat is endlese’ and burden: ‘Vita dulcedo et spes / Nostra maria tu es’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Perles prynces of euery placeOf heuen of erthe of see of
                    sonde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…In blysse with the and many mooOur woo thow sese oure Ioy
                    increseGraunt us that pease that is endlesse
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 335-6.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 155-6; 1977, 138-9.
